name: Planets and Pixels
description:
This little game was made for the Graffiti Jam. You will play as a bounty hunter travelling from planet to planet looking for missions. Use your money to buy better weapons from traders and explore the galaxy! 

Features
  • A randomly generated galaxy for each run
  • Fancy gun slinging action
  • Very minimalist pixels
Developer note

The game is far from having all the features it should have, but I sadly could not use all the time that was available during the jam. The HTML version is a little different from the source code, since I found out I had accidentally left on some developer settings, but I turned those off. There is no winning condition either, but I hope you have fun regardless!

Controls
  • Left Mouse - Shoot
  • Right Mouse - Aim
  • Scroll - Zoom
  • WASD - Move
  • R - Reload
  • Q - Select Weapon Menu
  • M - Map
  • E - Interact
